connector.description: Receive data from an SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionHost.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionHost
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionHost.description: The hostname of the SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionPort.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionPort
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionPort.description: The port of the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.username
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.username.description: The username to access the SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.password
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.password.description: The password to access the SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.recursive.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.recursive
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.recursive.description: If a directory, look for files in all sub-directories as well.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.ignoreFileNotF.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.ignoreFileNotFoundOrPermissionError
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.ignoreFileNotF.description: Whether to ignore when (trying to list files in directories or when downloading a file), which does not exist or due to permission error. By default when a directory or file does not exists or insufficient permission, then an exception is thrown. Setting this option to true allows to ignore that instead.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.binary.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.binary
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.binary.description: Specifies the file transfer mode, BINARY or ASCII. Default is ASCII (false).

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyFile.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyFile
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyFile.description: Set the private key file so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyPass.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyPassphrase
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyPass.description: Set the private key file passphrase so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyUri.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyUri
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.privateKeyUri.description: Set the private key file (loaded from classpath by default) so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.strictHostKeyC.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.strictHostKeyChecking
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.strictHostKeyC.description: Sets whether to use strict host key checking.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.useUserKnownHo.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.useUserKnownHostsFile
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.useUserKnownHo.description: If knownHostFile has not been explicit configured then use the host file from System.getProperty(user.home)/.ssh/known_hosts.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.delete.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.delete
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.delete.description: If true, the file will be deleted after it is processed successfully.
